code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={isModalOpened:{gameMenu:false,mainMenu:false}};var modalSlice=createSlice({name:'modal',initialState:initialState,reducers:{toggleModal:function toggleModal(state,action){state.isModalOpened[action.payload]=!state.isModalOpened[action.payload];},setModal:function setModal(state,action){state.isModalOpened[action.payload.modal]=action.payload.status;}}});var _modalSlice$actions=modalSlice.actions,toggleModal=_modalSlice$actions.toggleModal,setModal=_modalSlice$actions.setModal;export{toggleModal,setModal};export var selectIsModalOpened=function selectIsModalOpened(state){return state.modal.isModalOpened;};export var modalReducer=modalSlice.reducer;
